review: Cool. Now you can easily watch your android phone videos on your TV with Chromecast. Right?  WRONG!!!  No, you have to find another file explorer app, install that.  Then install add on for that.  Then browse through all your phones folders and files and hope to find where your videos files are stored. Find the one you want.  Open with the file explorer... and so on.  Ridiculous.  Way to support your own products Google. :(But you can watch videos from vudu, and netflix, and whoever happens to make an app that supports Chromecast. Then use your phone as the remote control, where every app works differently.  Good luck pausing and rewinding to hear something you missed. Wow...
